changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.location_relationship AS SELECT lr.id, rel.name AS relationship, b.name AS product_mapped_value, lr.sequence_number, la1.name AS location_1_attribute, att_rel.name AS attribute_relationship, la2.name AS location_2_attribute, res.name AS updated_by, lr.update_date FROM ruleform.location_relationship lr JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON lr.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.product b ON lr.product_mapped_value = b.id JOIN ruleform.attribute la1 ON lr.location_1_attribute = la1.id JOIN ruleform.relationship att_rel ON lr.attribute_relationship = att_rel.id JOIN ruleform.attribute la2 ON lr.location_2_attribute = la2.id JOIN ruleform.agency res ON lr.updated_by = res.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.location_relationship OWNER TO core;
